multiPlayStartLimitEventFlagId.Wiki: Multiplayer start restriction event flag ID

otherDisableDistance.Wiki: Other distances where spirits cannot penetrate

multiPlayHostLimitEventFlagId.Wiki: Multiplayer host restriction event flag: When this flag is turned ON, multiplayer is prohibited as a host. Expected to include block clear flag. 0: No limit

cultNpcWhiteGhostEntityId_byFree.Wiki: The beginning of the free frame ID used as the entity ID of the summoned NPC in the NPC white spirit summoning ritual

bMapGuardianRegion.Wiki: Do you want to increase or decrease the frame of the map guardian area?

bYellowCostumeRegion.Wiki: Is it the yellow-robed old man's signature area?

isSummonPosStartForRed.Wiki: Is the dark spirit invading the starting direction?

warpItemUsePermitBonfireId_1.Wiki: Entity ID 1 of the bonfire used to determine whether to allow the use of warp items

warpItemUsePermitBonfireId_2.Wiki: Entity ID 2 of the bonfire used to determine whether to allow the use of warp items

warpItemUsePermitBonfireId_3.Wiki: Entity ID 3 of the bonfire used to determine whether to allow the use of warp items

warpItemUsePermitBonfireId_4.Wiki: Entity ID 4 of the bonfire used to determine whether to allow the use of warp items

warpItemUsePermitBonfireId_5.Wiki: Entity ID 5 of the bonfire used to determine whether to allow the use of warp items

warpItemProhibitionEventFlagId_1.Wiki: Event flag ID1 that determines whether the use of warp items is prohibited. Warp item permission has higher priority than judgment based on bonfire ID.

warpItemProhibitionEventFlagId_2.Wiki: Event flag ID2 that determines whether the use of warp items is prohibited. Warp item permission has higher priority than judgment based on bonfire ID.

warpItemProhibitionEventFlagId_3.Wiki: Event flag ID3 that determines whether the use of warp items is prohibited. Warp item permission has higher priority than judgment based on bonfire ID.

warpItemProhibitionEventFlagId_4.Wiki: Event flag ID4 that determines whether the use of warp items is prohibited. Warp item permission has higher priority than judgment based on bonfire ID.

warpItemProhibitionEventFlagId_5.Wiki: Event flag ID5 that determines whether the use of warp items is prohibited. Warp item permission has higher priority than judgment based on bonfire ID.

enableGhost.Wiki: Ghosts of other players can be seen

multiPlayHASHostLimitEventFlagId.Wiki: Yellow Robed Old Man Host Restriction Event Flag: When this flag is turned on, multiplayer play as a Yellow Robed Old Man host is prohibited. Expected to include block clear flag. 0: No limit

returnPointEntityId.Wiki: Return position when the PC falls. Set the entity ID of the MapStudio point type 'warp point'. If it is -1, it will return to the save position.
